metadata.title: CVE-2017-13722 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the pcfGetProperties function in bitmap/pcfread.c in libXfont through1.5.2 and 2.x before 2.0.2, a missing boundary check (for PCF files) couldbe used by local attackers authenticated to an Xserver for a bufferover-read, for information disclosure or a crash of the X server.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-13722` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libxfont1 - 1:1.5.1-1ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

libxfont2 - 1:2.0.1-3~ubuntu16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libxfont package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.5.1-1ubuntu0.16.04.3').
libxfont2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.1-3~ubuntu16.04.2').
